creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: seated boy with open mouth; wood and hide drum on lap, drum beater in PR hand; boy wears headband, sash and pouch on a shoulder strap; brown and black pigments
markings: on bottom, in blue: [Ada Suina/ Cochiti Pueblo/ 1/5/80]; on bottom, on sticker: [85A]
title: Storyteller Figure
